name: Devious (itch)
description:
A Moonmoon_OW GameJam Entry

 Jump, Grapple, Wallslide, and Fireball your way through a crumbling castle to defeat the Moon Knight laying in wait.

A 2D Action/Platformer intended to have combat and level design that forces the player to plan their movements in advance. Currently only a single concept level is available.

We plan on re-evaluating the engine/code design from the ground up to better realize the game's potential.

Special thanks to the artist behind everything you can see.

Itty Bitty Boat - Instagram: @depietro_draws
